actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Doctor Armando Sandoval, his wife, Holivia Hofilena Sandoval, and their children, Nelissa Sandoval, Armando Sandoval, Jr., Oliver Sandoval and Katrina Sandoval.

summary.text: Declares six named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Doctor Armando Sandoval, his wife, Holivia Hofilena Sandoval, and their children, Nelissa Sandoval, Armando Sandoval, Jr., Oliver Sandoval and Katrina Sandoval.
